attributes.tagline: Where Future Champions Begin Their Journey!
attributes.description: Join Manhattan's premier tennis camp designed specifically for young athletes ages 5-12! Our expert coaches create a fun, safe, and encouraging environment where kids learn tennis fundamentals, build confidence, and make lasting friendships. Located in the heart of downtown Manhattan with easy access for busy families.
attributes.location: Central Park Tennis Center, 830 5th Ave, New York, NY 10065
attributes.features:
🎾 Professional coaching by certified instructors
⭐ Small group sizes (max 6 kids per court)
🏆 Weekly mini-tournaments and skill challenges
🥤 Healthy snacks and hydration breaks included
🎨 Arts & crafts tennis-themed activities
🏃‍♂️ Fitness games and agility training
🎁 Camp t-shirt and water bottle included
📸 Weekly photo updates for parents
🌟 End-of-summer awards ceremony
attributes.schedule:
Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM
• 9:00-9:30 AM: Warm-up games & stretching
• 9:30-11:00 AM: Tennis fundamentals & drills
• 11:00-11:15 AM: Snack break
• 11:15 AM-12:30 PM: Court games & practice matches
• 12:30-1:30 PM: Lunch break
• 1:30-2:30 PM: Fun activities & mini-tournaments
• 2:30-3:00 PM: Cool-down & camp circle

Extended care available 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM for additional fee
attributes.testimonials:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "My 8-year-old Emma absolutely loved this camp! She went from never holding a racket to serving and rallying. The coaches were amazing with kids." - Sarah M., Upper East Side

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Best investment we made this summer! Our twin boys (age 6) made friends, learned tennis, and had a blast. Very organized and professional." - Michael R., Tribeca

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "The location is perfect for our family. Coaches really know how to keep kids engaged and excited about tennis. Highly recommend!" - Jennifer L., Midtown
